summary: Empty issue with no content — accidental creation, immediately closed by author

analysis.summary: Issue has no body, no comments, and a title of 'TO DELETE PLEASE'. It was opened and closed within minutes on the same day. This is an accidental or test issue creation with zero actionable content.
analysis.rationale: type: No bug, feature, enhancement, or documentation request is described. The issue is empty. 'type/question' is the least-wrong classification for an issue with no actionable content. Low confidence reflects that none of the types truly fit. actionability.suggestedAction: Issue is already closed with no content. No action is needed. 'close-as-fixed' reflects that the issue lifecycle is complete — there is nothing to investigate, answer, or fix. area: The issue has no content so no specific area can be determined. Defaulting to the core SkiaSharp area as the catch-all for unclassifiable issues.
nextQuestions: Whether the author intended to file a real issue and accidentally submitted early

actionability.reason: Issue is already closed with no content — no action needed

actions.description: Apply question label to empty issue
